entry.tran: （生病或休假的医生或牧师的）临时代理
entry.def: A locum is a doctor or priest who does the work for another doctor or priest who is ill or on holiday.

means.word_mean: 1. someone (physician or clergyman) who substitutes temporarily for another member of the same profession
